change-pass.desc-pass: Please note that once you change your password, you will be de-authorised from all other devices.

2fa.title: Setting Google Authenticator
2fa.activate-desc: Download Google Authenticator App and scan the QR code using the application
2fa.activate-info: If you cannot scan the code, enter it manually.
2fa.access-codes-info: Use one of these codes to log in if your device is lost. Keep in mind that each code can only be used once.

change-email.desc-error: Please try again later or contact Support
change-email.desc-confirm: A confirmation code was sent to the {{variant}} email you provided.
